back_text:

[cultist]: -2. Place 1 resource on this card, as a switch.
[tablet]: -3. If you fail, move the Mine cart once.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, remove 1 switch from this card.

[elder_thing]: -5. Remove 1 switch from this card.

[cultist]: -3. If you succeed, place 1 resource on this card, as a switch.
[tablet]: -4. Move the Mine Cart once.
[elder_thing]: -5. Take 1 damage.
name: Written in Rock
text:
Hard / Expert - Act 1
[skull]: -X. X is twice your location's column number.
[cultist]: -3. If you succeed, place 1 resource on this card, as a scrap.
[tablet]: -4. Remove 1 scrap from this card.
[elder_thing]: -5. Take 1 damage.

name: Prismatic Shard
text:
Uses (4 brilliance).
[reaction] When a scenario card effect would discard any number of cards from your hand, exhaust Prismatic Shard and spend 1 brilliance: Ignore that effect and draw that many cards, instead.

back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is twice your current floor number (to a minimum of 2).
[cultist]: -2. If you succeed and your location is an enemy, exhaust it.
[tablet]: -4. If you fail, heal 1[per_investigator] damage from the nearest enemy-location.
[elder_thing]: -5. If it is agenda 2a or 3a, after this test resolves, remove this token from the chaos bag and add it to the predation bag.
name: Hemlock House
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is your current floor number (to a minimum of 1).
[cultist]: -1. If your location is an enemy, exhaust it.
[tablet]: -3. If you fail, heal 1 damage from the nearest enemy-location.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, and it is agenda 2a or 3a, after this test resolves, remove this token from the chaos bag and add it to the predation bag.

name: Little Sylvie
text: [reaction] When Little Sylvie is discarded from your hand or deck: Play it (paying its cost). [reaction] When a scenario card effect would discard a card from your hand or deck, exhaust Little Sylvie: Place that card on top of your deck, instead.

back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X the number of revealed [[Cave]] locations in play.
[cultist]: -1. If you succeed by 2 or more, heal 1 horror.
[tablet]: -4. If you are at a [[Cave]] location, treat this token's modifier as -6 instead.
[elder_thing]: -3. If an [[Abomination]] enemy is at your location, this test automatically fails instead.
name: The Lost Sister
text:
East / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is half the number of revealed [[Cave]] locations in play (rounded up).
[cultist]: -1. If you succeed, heal 1 horror.
[tablet]: -2. If you are at a [[Cave]] location, treat this token's modifier as -4 instead.
[elder_thing]: -2. If an [[Abomination]] enemy is at your location, reveal another token.

back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X the number of [[Insect]] enemies in play and in the victory display.
[cultist]: -3. If you succeed, you may shuffle a non-[[Elite]] enemy in the victory display into the encounter deck.
[tablet]: -5. Ready the nearest [[Insect]] enemy. It moves and attacks as if it were the enemy phase.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you are a [[Lair]] location, you automatically fail.
name: The Silent Heath
text:
East / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is half the number of [[Insect]] enemies in play and in the victory display (rounded up).
[cultist]: -1. You may shuffle a non-[[Elite]] enemy in the victory display into the encounter deck.
[tablet]: -3. If you fail, choose an [[Insect]] enemy at your location. It engages you and makes an immediate attack.
[elder_thing]: -2. If you are a [[Lair]] location, reveal another token.

back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X the number of [[Sunken]] locations in play (rounded up).
[cultist]: -3. If you succeed, you may remove 1 sinkhole from the nearest [[Bog]] location.
[tablet]: -5. Place 1 damage on the nearest [[Bog]] location, as a sinkhole.
[elder_thing]: -5. Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Grasping Tendril enemy and draw it, ignoring its surge keyword.
name: The Thing in the Depths
text:
East / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is half the number of [[Sunken]] locations in play (rounded up).
[cultist]: -1. You may remove 1 sinkhole from the nearest [[Bog]] location.
[tablet]: -3. If you fail, place 1 damage on the nearest [[Bog]] location, as a sinkhole.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Grasping Tendril enemy and draw it, ignoring its surge keyword.

back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is twice the current darkness level.
[cultist]: -3. If you succeed, heal 1 damage from your investigator.
[tablet]: -4. Find the enemy in pursuit with the highest evade. Spawn it at your location.
[elder_thing]: -5. Take 1 horror.
name: The Twisted Hollow
text:
East / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the current darkness level.
[cultist]: -1. Heal 1 damage from your investigator.
[tablet]: -3. If you fail, find the enemy in pursuit with the highest evade. Spawn it at your location.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, take 1 horror.

back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is the number of doom in play.
[cultist]: -3. If you succeed, place 1 barrier at your location.
[tablet]: -4. The nearest enemy readies, moves, and attacks as if it were the enemy phase.
[elder_thing]: -5. Remove a barrier, decoy, or trap at your location.
name: The Longest Night
text:
East / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is half the number of doom in play (rounded up).
[cultist]: -2. Place 1 barrier at your location.
[tablet]: -1. Reveal another token. If you fail, the nearest enemy readies, moves, and attacks as if it were the enemy phase.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, remove 1 barrier, decoy, or trap at your location.

name: Ajax
text:
Your first action each round does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
[action] Exhaust Ajax: Move. Either move twice, or choose any [[Field]] location and move to it.
[action] If Ajax is at your location: Take control of him. Any player at Ajax's location may trigger this ability.

back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is the number of [[Colour]] enemies in play.
[cultist]: -6. Discard 1 card at random from your hand.
[tablet]: -8. You may place 1 doom on your investigator card to treat this token's modifier as -3, instead.
[elder_thing]: -5. If this is a fight or evasion attempt against a Cosmic Emissary, you automatically fail instead.
name: Fate of the Vale
text:
East / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is 1 more than the current act number.
[cultist]: -4. If you fail, discard 1 card at random from your hand.
[tablet]: -5. You may place 1 doom on your investigator card to treat this token's modifier as 0, instead.
[elder_thing]: -2. If this is a fight or evasion attempt against a Cosmic Emissary, reveal another token.

name: Cosmic Emissary
text: Massive. Cannot make attacks of opportunity. Forced – When you successfully fight or evade this enemy: Instead of damaging or exhausting it, this enemy does not attack during the enemy phase this round.

name: Cosmic Emissary
text: Massive. Retaliate. Cannot make attacks of opportunity. Forced – When you successfully fight or evade this enemy: Instead of damaging or exhausting it, this enemy does not attack during the enemy phase this round.

name: Cosmic Emissary
text: Massive. Alert. Cannot make attacks of opportunity. Forced – When you successfully fight or evade this enemy: Instead of damaging or exhausting it, this enemy does not attack during the enemy phase this round.

name: Cosmic Emissary
text: Massive. Cannot make attacks of opportunity. Forced – When you successfully fight or evade this enemy: Instead of damaging or exhausting it, this enemy does not attack during the enemy phase this round.

flavor:
"Most of the creatures seemed not quite usual in their aspects and motions..."
 - H.P. Lovecraft, "The Colour Out of Space"
name: Swarm
text: Revelation – Test [agility] (3). For each point you fail by, you must either lose 1 resource or take 1 damage.

flavor:
"...there descended such a blinding sheet of torrential rain that shelter became imperative."
 - H.P. Lovecraft, "The Lurking Fear"
name: Downpour
text: Revelation – Test [intellect] (3). For each point you fail by, you must either lose 1 action or place 1 of your clues on your location.

flavor: I am the eyes I am all eyes that see
name: Otherworldy Visions
text: Revelation – Test [willpower] (3). This test gets +2 difficulty if there is a [[Colour]] enemy at your location. For each point you fail by, you must either take 1 horror or discard 1 card at random from your hand.

back_flavor: Bertie approaches, absolutely winded. "Dr. Marquez requests your immediate presence," he huffs, butting into your conversation. "And believe me, she will not like it if you're late at all."
flavor: The Miskatonic Survey is staying in Hemlock Vale and making preparations for today's expedition. The more the locals trust you, the better you will understand the nature of Hemlock Isle.
name: Welcome to Hemlock Vale!
text: Forced - When you draw a weakness: cancel its revelation effect and discard it.

back_text:
If you flipped this act while or after playing the Dawn of the First Day prelude, read the following:
The sweetness of the air and the vibrant colors are overwhelming. Your pulse is electric as gooseflesh creeps up your arm and your skin prickles, almost as if under an invisible caress. You are not alone, you never were alone, but the one who is with you is you, and you, and you, and you, and you and you and and and and You catch yourself staring up at the glassy sky, bewildered and drunk with wonder.
You (and only you) earn 1 bonus experience (do not spend it until instructed)
flavor: The village brims with excitement! Children play along the roadside wearing animal masks, while others hang gaudy flowers on eaves and along fences.
name: Dawn of the First Day
text: Investigators cannot take damage/horror or be defeated. Objective - Befriend the locals and prepare for the first survey! (Refer to the rules on page 6 for more information on preludes)

back_flavor: You reconvene back the boarding house. Ms. Olmstead lays out a spread of warm buttered cornbread, roasted radishes the size of your fist, and a pile of grey oily eggs. Your stomach growls as you nibble on some of your field rations rather than partake.
back_text: Check the campaign log: If Bertie was rescued, (→R1) (page 42). Otherwise, (→R2) (page 42).
flavor: Dreary clouds threaten rain as thunder rumbles overhead. Locals bustle about making preparations.
name: Dark Clouds
text: Forced - When you draw a weakness: cancel its revelation effect and discard it.

back_text:
If you flipped this act while or after playing the Dawn of the Second Day prelude, read the following:
As you walk through the village, a wave of dizziness washes over you and you stumble forward, putting your hand out to steady yourself. You cut your palm on the corner of a stack of mirrors and cry out in pain as thick, heavy raindrops begin to fall.
([codex] 17) (page 42).
flavor: The village continues preparations with cheery resolve, despite the dour weather.
name: Dawn of the Second Day
text: Investigators cannot take damage/horror or be defeated. Objective - Talk to the locals and learn more about Hemlock Isle!

name: The Hemlock Curse
text: This skill's icons subtract from your skill value instead of adding to it. If this skill test fails, discard each card in your hand. Forced - At the end of your turn, if The Hemlock Curse is in your hand: Discard 1 card at random from your hand.

name: Mother Rachel
text: While you control Mother Rachel, you have 1 additional arcane slot. [action]: Parley. Test [willpower](2). If you succeed, ([codex] 1). Forced - After Mother Rachel is defeated: Set her aside, out of play. In your Campaign Log, decrease her Relationship Level.

name: Leah Atwood
text: While you control Leah Atwood, you get +1 [combat]. [action]: Parley. Test [combat](2). If you succeed, ([codex] 2). Forced - After Leah Atwood is defeated. Set her aside, out of play. In your Campaign Log, decrease her Relationship Level.

name: Simeon Atwood
text: While you control Simeon Atwood, you get +1 [agility]. [action]: Parley. Test [agility](2). If you succeed, ([codex] 3). Forced - After Simeon Atwood is defeated: Set him aside, out of play. In your Campaign Log, decrease his Relationship Level.

name: William Hemlock
text: While you control William Hemlock, you get +1 [intellect]. [action]: Parley. Test [intellect](2). If you succeed, ([codex] 4). Forced - After William Hemlock is defeated. Set him aside, out of play. In your Campaign Log, decrease his Relationship Level.

name: River Hawthorne
Gideon Mizrah
text: While you control Gideon Mizrah, you have 1 additional accessory slot. [action] [action]: Parley. ([codex] 6). Forced - After Gideon Mizrah is defeated: Set him aside, out of play. In your Campaign Log, decrease his Relationship Level.

name: Judith Park
text: While you control Judith Park, you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to fight. [action] Spend X resources, where X is the current day number: Parley. ([codex] 7). Forced - After Judith Park is defeated: Set her aside, out of play. In your Campaign Log, decrease her Relationship Level.

name: Theo Peters
text: While you control Theo Peters, you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to move. [action] Choose and discard X cards from your hand, where X is the current day number: Parley. ([codex] 8). Forced - After Theo Peters is defeated: Set him aside, out of play. In your Campaign Log, decrease his Relationship Level.

name: Bertie Musgrave
text: While you control Bertie Musgrave, you get +1 health and + 1 sanity [fast] Take either 1 damage or 1 horror and exhaust Bertie Musgrave: Parley. Draw 1 card ([codex] Ω). Forced - After Bertie Musgrave is defeated: Set him aside, out of play.

flavor: "If it's survival of the fittest, I intend to survive."
name: Dr. Rosa Marquez
text: While you control Dr. Rosa Marquez, you get +1 [intellect] and +1 [agility]. [reaction] After you discover the last clue at your location ([codex] Ω).

flavor: "Change is inevitable. The question is how we weather it."
name: Helen Peters
text: (Day [day]) you get +1 [combat]. (Night [night]) you get +1 [agility]. [reaction] After you enter a location, exhaust Helen Peters and deal 1 damage to her: Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location and automatically evade it.

back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is 1 more than the current day number.
[cultist]: -1. If this is a parley attempt, treat this token's modifier as a +1, instead.
[tablet]: -4. If you have fewer than 2 cards in hand, treat this token's modifier as -2 instead.
[elder_thing]: -3. If this is a parley attempt, reveal another token.
name: The Vale
text:
East / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the current day number.
[cultist]: +1. If this is a parley attempt, you automatically succeed.
[tablet]: -2. If you have fewer than 3 cards in hand, treat this token's modifier as 0 instead.
[elder_thing]: -1. If this is a parley attempt, reveal another token.

flavor: The stone is worn and smooth.
name: Worry Rock
text:
Fast.
[reaction] When a scenario card effect discards Worry Rock from your hand: Draw 3 cards. (Limit once per game.)

flavor: A traditional Abenaki doll made to look like Mother Rachel.
name: Corn Husk Doll
text:
Fast. Uses (3 wishes).
[reaction] When a [skull] or [tablet] token is revealed at your location, spend 1 wish and exhaust Corn Husk Doll: Treat that token as a [cultist] token instead.

name: The Pearl Diary
text: (Day [day]) You get +1 [intellect]. (Night [night]) You get +1 [willpower]. [reaction] After an investigator at your location draws a [[Blight]] or [[Power]] card from the encounter deck, exhaust The Pearl Diary: That investigator draws 1 card.

flavor: Knotty, scaly growths erupt on the skin, resembling scales or vestigial fingernails.
name: Strange Mutations
text: Revelation – Test [willpower] (5). Reduce the difficulty of this test by 1 for each horror on you. If you fail, you must either take 2 horror, or discard 2 cards at random from your hand.

name: Fungal Rot
text: Revelation – Attach Fungal Rot to an [[Item]] asset you control without Fungal Rot attached. If you cannot, Fungal Rot gains surge. Treat attached asset's text box as if it were blank (except for [[Traits]]). [action]: Test [combat] (3). If you succeed, discard Fungal Rot. Otherwise, take 1 damage.

flavor: The sores won't heal on their own, and emit a sharp chemical scent.
name: Enervation
text: Revelation – Test [combat] (5). Reduce the difficulty of this test by 1 for each damage on you. If you fail, you must either take 2 damage, or choose the card with the highest printed cost in your hand and discard it.

name: Dessication
text: Revelation – Put Dessication into play next to the agenda deck. As an additional cost for an investigator to play a card, they must take 1 damage. Forced – At the end of the round: Discard 1 copy of Dessication from play. (Max once per round.)

name: Empyrean Brilliance
text: (Day [day]) Revelation – Test 2 [willpower]. Increase the difficulty of this test by 2 if you have 5 or more cards in hand. If you fail, choose and discard 2 cards from your hand. (Night [night]) Revelation – Discard 1 card at random from your hand. Test [willpower] (X). X is that card's printed cost. If you fail, take 2 horror.

flavor: Who do you see beyond the veil?
name: Captivating Gleam
text: Surge. Revelation – Put Captivating Gleam into play in your threat area. Limit 1 per investigator. Forced – If you have no cards in hand: Take 5 horror and discard Captivating Gleam.

name: Sudden Mutation
text: Revelation – Attach to the nearest non-[[Elite]] enemy. If you cannot, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Mutated]] enemy and draw it. Forced – When attached enemy is defeated: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded and spawn it at this location.

flavor:
"It is not the strongest of the species that survives, not the most intelligent that survives. It is the one that is most adaptable to change"
 - Charles Darwin
name: Unnatural Growth
text: Revelation – Place 1 doom on the nearest enemy with no doom on it. If no doom was placed by this effect, discard 2 cards at random from your hand.

name: Fire!
text: Revelation – Attach Fire! to the nearest location with no copy of Fire! attached (connected to a location with Fire! attached, if able). [action]: Test [agility] (4). If you succeed, discard Fire! Forced – At the end of the round: Each card with health at this location takes 1 direct damage.
